mapper.select: SELECT tl.*, SUM(tlc.visited_count) AS visited_count, GROUP_CONCAT(tlc.character_id) AS charIds FROM sf_textbook_lesson tl LEFT JOIN sf_textbook_lesson_character tlc ON tl.id = tlc.lesson_id AND tlc.is_deleted = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND tl.is_deleted = 0 AND tl.textbook_id = #{textbookId} GROUP BY tl.id
mapper.update: UPDATE sf_textbook_lesson SET chars = ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( sc.char_s SEPARATOR '、' ) FROM sf_textbook_lesson_character tlc LEFT JOIN sf_character sc ON tlc.character_id = sc.id WHERE tlc.is_deleted = 0 AND sc.is_deleted = 0 AND tlc.lesson_id = #{id} ), char_count = ( SELECT COUNT( * ) FROM sf_textbook_lesson_character tlc LEFT JOIN sf_character sc ON tlc.character_id = sc.id WHERE tlc.is_deleted = 0 AND sc.is_deleted = 0 AND tlc.lesson_id = #{id} ) WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sf_textbook_lesson WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND `code` = #{code} LIMIT 1

SELECT t.id AS textbookId, tl.id AS lessonId, c.id AS characterId, t.`name` AS textbookName, tl.`name` AS lessonName, c.char_s AS characterName FROM sf_textbook_lesson tl LEFT JOIN sf_textbook t ON tl.textbook_id = t.id AND t.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sf_textbook_lesson_character tlc ON tl.id = tlc.lesson_id AND tlc.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sf_character c ON tlc.character_id = c.id AND c.is_deleted = 0 WHERE 1 = 1 AND tl.is_deleted = 0 AND tl.`code` = #{code} LIMIT 1
